project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters, with a customizable length defined by the user.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes lowercase letters
Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters
Implement password generation logic that includes numbers
Implement password generation logic that includes special characters
Create a mechanism to allow the user to specify password length
Write tests to verify the functionality of the password generation
Execute tests on the password generation script to ensure all requirements are met
